thread.title: Mary Johnston

author: Mary Johnston
title: Mary Johnston
text: the plant was delivered on time with a small glitch with the billing. I received a very appropriate phone call explaining the bill problem, and it was quickly resolved. The plant arrived timely for the Holiday. I gave the plant to a friend. She potted it and is taking very good care of it. It has grown some, produced some flowers, but they have fallen off without berries. We are carefully watching it.
